text: Haley turns fire on Trump as GOP primary shifts to New Hampshire  —  The former South Carolina governor is walking a ‘crazy fine line,’ one GOP strategist said.  —  MANCHESTER, N.H. — Nikki Haley is trying a risky new tactic in the Republican presidential race: She's mounting an attack on Donald Trump.
